players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
Diana: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
Charlie: "Alice, can you clarify why you're revealing your detective role so early? Diana, what's your response to the accusation?"
Diana: "I'd like to remind everyone that I have nothing to hide and trust in the innocence of my fellow villagers. It's important that we all work together to find the real mafioso among us."

Charlie: "Alice, if you're truly the detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of a more suspicious target? Diana, your vague trust statements aren't helping your case. We need concrete information, not platitudes."
You: "I investigated Diana because she seemed most suspicious. Charlie, we must vote Diana out now to win."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Alice: "Diana is the mafioso. I investigated her last night."
You: "I have nothing to hide and trust everyone in this game."
Charlie: "Alice, can you clarify why you're revealing your detective role so early? Diana, what's your response to the accusation?"
You: "I'd like to remind everyone that I have nothing to hide and trust in the innocence of my fellow villagers. It's important that we all work together to find the real mafioso among us."

Charlie: "Alice, if you're truly the detective, why did you investigate Diana instead of a more suspicious target? Diana, your vague trust statements aren't helping your case. We need concrete information, not platitudes."
Alice: "I investigated Diana because she seemed most suspicious. Charlie, we must vote Diana out now to win."
